product_name: Louis Garneau X-Lite Bike Jacket - Men's
long_description: Slip on this ultralight, breathable windbreaker to be prepared for changes in weather on the road in the Louis Garneau X-Lite Bike Jacket for men. This ultralight, windbreaking, breathable jacket weighs in at a mere 2.2 oz.; packs small enough to fit in its own collar. Full-length zip offers maximum ventilation; zip garage prevents neck irritation. Inner flap increases protection against the wind. Articulated elbows allow for flexibility and ease of movement. Narrow back opening allows acess to jersey pockets. Reflective accents on front, back and around zip. Stretch trim at collar, wrists and hem provide a good fit. The Louis Garneau X-Lite Bike Jacket for men has mesh underarm panels for ventilation.
short_description: Slip on this ultralight, breathable windbreaker to be prepared for changes in weather on the road in the Louis Garneau X-Lite Bike Jacket for men.
